title: NF-Exos: NF-derived exosomes
treatment_protocol_ch1: NFs or CAFs cultured to confluency were incubated with serum-free DMEM for 48 h. The CM was collected and filtered through a 0.22 渭m PVDF filter. Exosomes were purified from NF- or CAF-CM using ultracentrifugation and placed on ice in the Lysis/Binding Buffer.
growth_protocol_ch1: NFs and CAFs were cultured in Dulbecco's Modified Eagle Medium (DMEM, Gibco-BRL) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (Gibco-BRL), 100 units/mL penicillin, and 100 渭g/mL streptomycin at 37掳C in a humidified 5% CO2 atmosphere.
extract_protocol_ch1: Exosomal RNA was extracted using mirVanaTM miRNA Isolation Kit (Ambion, USA) according to the manufacturer's instructions.
label_protocol_ch1: Exosomal RNA were tailed with Poly A. FlashTag Biotin HSR labeled RNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 1 μg total RNA (FlashTag™ Biotin HSR RNA Labeling Kit For miRNA Arrays, 2012, Affymetrix).
hyb_protocol: Biotin-labeled sample were hybridized for 16 h at 48掳C on an Affymetrix miRNA 3.0 array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
scan_protocol: GeneChips were scanned using the Hewlett-Packard GeneArray Scanner G3000 7G.
description: miRNA expression data from NF-derived exosomes
data_processing: Affymetrix GeneChip Command Console software (version 4.0, Affymetrix) was used to get raw data and then RMA normalization method was taken. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 100.
